name: Atlassian MCP Server
description: Provides Jira issue analysis, Confluence knowledge exploration, and documentation automation for Atlassian cloud.

endpoints.name: Jira Issue Analyzer
endpoints.description: Retrieves and summarizes Jira issue details, translating requirements into actionable guidance.

endpoints.name: Confluence Knowledge Explorer
endpoints.description: Searches Confluence pages to extract and organize relevant documentation.

endpoints.name: README Generator
endpoints.description: Automatically creates README files using project details.

endpoints.name: README to Confluence
endpoints.description: Publishes README content to Confluence pages.

prompts.name: Summarize Jira Issues
prompts.description: Convert complex Jira tickets into clear summaries and actionable development approaches.

prompts.name: Explore Confluence
prompts.description: Extract and present relevant documentation from Confluence.

prompts.name: Generate README
prompts.description: Create a README file following IT practice standards.

prompts.name: Publish README to Confluence
prompts.description: Publish README content to a designated Confluence page.
